localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Kaleidoscope 2.4 features a new powerful integration with the Xcode debugger. Send any debugger command (ksp) or object (kspo) output to Kaleidoscope. This enables iterating over common development tasks quickly.
blogPost.body: Kaleidoscope 2.4 features a new powerful integration with the Xcode debugger. Send any debugger command (ksp) or object (kspo) output to Kaleidoscope. This enables iterating over common development tasks quickly.
blogPost.title: Kaleidoscope 2.4 - Compare debug output. Now with Xcode integration
blogPost.author: Florian Albrecht

localize.description: Kaleidoscope 2.4的特点是与Xcode调试器进行了新的强大集成。将任何调试器命令（ksp）或对象（kspo）输出发送到Kaleidoscope。这使其能够快速迭代常见的开发任务。
localize.tagline: 比较调试输出。现在与Xcode集成

localize.description: Kaleidoscope 2.4的特點是與Xcode調試器進行了新的強大集成。將任何調試器命令（ksp）或對象（kspo）輸出發送到Kaleidoscope。這使其能夠快速迭代常見的開發任務。
localize.tagline: 比較調試輸出。現在與Xcode集成

previous.excerpt: LiveFlow (YC W21) is your first fully automated, NextGen Spreadsheet, that connects real-time data from your Google Sheets, banks, accounting and revenue platforms in a matter of seconds to fully flexible and customizable dashboards.
previous.title: LiveFlow - One hub to automate your finances

localize.description: LiveFlow (YC W21)是您的第一个完全自动化的下一代电子表格，它能在几秒钟内将来自Google Sheets、银行、会计和收入平台的实时数据连接到完全灵活和可定制的仪表盘。
localize.tagline: 一个让您的财务自动化的中心

localize.description: LiveFlow (YC W21)是您的第一個完全自動化的下一代電子表格，它能在幾秒鐘內將來自Google Sheets、銀行、會計和收入平臺的實時數據連接到完全靈活和可定製的儀表盤。
localize.tagline: 一個讓您的財務自動化的中心

localize.description: BlueReceipt是Shopify品牌的文本营销自动化。它就像Mailchimp X Slack一样，围绕着给您的客户发送短信而建立。在一个强大的仪表板中实现弹出式、自动和广播。获取我们的免费入门计划，并在<5分钟内开始!
BlueReceipt是Shopify品牌的文本營銷自動化。它就像Mailchimp X Slack一樣，圍繞着給您的客戶發送短信而建立。在一個強大的儀表板中實現彈出式、自動和廣播。獲取我們的免費入門計劃，並在<5分鐘內開始!
